articles.content: India beat Australia in the 3rd T20I on Sunday in yet another thrilling last over finish to bag the three-match series 2-1. The victory helped India extend its lead at the top of the ICC T20I ranking… [+1282 chars]

articles.title: Green's performances very impressive and bodes well, says McDonald | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: While admitting that his side needs to improve at the death, the Australian coach sounded optimistic going forward with Starc set to bolster the XI
articles.content:
Green smashed 52 off 21 in the third T20I © BCCI
Australia coach Andrew McDonald has lauded young allrounder Cameron Green's performances in the T20I series against India. Even though Australia lost… [+3340 chars]

articles.author: ICC
articles.title: India get rankings boost following T20I series triumph over Australia - ICC Cricket
articles.description: India's narrow series triumph over Australia has been rewarded with Rohit Sharma's side extending their lead at the top of the MRF Tyres ICC Men's T20I Team Rankings.
articles.content: India's narrow series triumph over Australia has been rewarded with Rohit Sharma's side extending their lead at the top of the MRF Tyres ICC Men's T20I Team Rankings.Half centuries to Suryakumar Yada… [+1916 chars]

articles.title: Bowlers, Stafanie Taylor, Hayley Matthews help West Indies deny New Zealand a series sweep | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: West Indies pulled one back in the third and final ODI after New Zealand sealed the series early after the second fixture
articles.content: A combined bowling effort complimented by Stafanie Taylor's half-century and captain Hayley Matthews's all-round show helped West Indies deny New Zealand the chance to claim a clean sweep in the thre… [+2064 chars]
